CustomField.description: Campo que contiene el importe de la hipoteca
CustomField.formula: IF( AV_LoanAmountAmount__c>= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(AV_LoanAmountAmount__c/ 1000000)) & ".", "") & IF( AV_LoanAmountAmount__c>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_LoanAmountAmount__c/ 1000)), 3) & ".", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(AV_LoanAmountAmount__c)), 3) & " " & AV_LoanAmountCCY__c
CustomField.label: Importe de la hipoteca
